languages.text: Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все союзники с эффектом Приготовиться! получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытий{/g} для них увеличивается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. В течение дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели могут использовать только {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. During that extra turn, the allies can only move or use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}.

Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. During that extra turn, the allies can only move or use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}.

All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. During that extra turn, the allies can only move or use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}.

languages.text: Wird der {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt bewirkt, erhalten alle betroffenen Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} erhöht sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +30 %.
languages.original_text: Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wird der {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt bewirkt, erhalten alle betroffenen Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} erhöht sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +30 %. Während dieses Zusatzzuges können sich die Verbündeten lediglich bewegen und {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} ausführen.

Alle Verbündeten, die von Bereit machen für Einschlag! betroffen sind, erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und erhöhen ihre {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +20 %. Die Ziele können in diesem Zusatzzug nur Bewegungsfähigkeiten, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} einsetzen.

languages.text: Une fois l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} appliqué, tous les alliés affectés gagnent immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. De plus, leur efficacité de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} augmente de +30 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une fois l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} appliqué, tous les alliés affectés gagnent immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. De plus, leur efficacité de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} augmente de +30 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Au cours de ce tour supplémentaire, les alliés peuvent uniquement se déplacer ou utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g}.

languages.text: 获得{g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果的每位盟友，都会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，在此额外回合中拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时获得+30%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Once the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect is applied, each affected ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency increased by +30% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 获得{g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果的每位盟友，都会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，在此额外回合中拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时获得+30%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。在此额外回合中，受影响的盟友只能移动，或使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。

所有受到迎接冲击！影响的盟友都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，在此额外回合中拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。在此额外回合中，受影响的目标只能使用移动能力、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando se aplica el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g}, todos los aliados afectados ganan de inmediato un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y su eficacia de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} aumenta un +30 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se aplica el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g}, todos los aliados afectados ganan de inmediato un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {uip|MP|3954f643aecd46a78c689f1963f446d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y su eficacia de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} aumenta un +30 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Durante ese turno extra, los aliados solo pueden moverse o usar {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}.

衝撃に備えろ！の効果を受けているすべての味方は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}、3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}のボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}が+20%増加する。
